biotools.summary: OpenGDC is an open-source Java tool for the automatic extraction, extension, and conversion in BED, GTF, CSV, JSON, and XML format of the genomic experiments and clinical information from the Genomic Data Commons (GDC) portal at https://gdc.cancer.gov/

bioschemas.name: OpenGDC
